content: the red pointy hat by april mazzola sizing one size fits most adults materials worsted weight acrylic yarn approx 141 g / 5 oz red us 4 3 5 mm 14 circular needles us 7 4 5 mm 14 circular needles or interchangeable equivalent stitch markers 1 round marker 2 secondary markers tapestry needle pattern using the smaller needles cast on 96 stitches using your preferred stretchy cast-on a long-tail cast on is recommended join in the round being careful not to twist place marker for the beginning of the round ribbing k1 p1 around continue in 1x1 rib for 2 inches / 5 cm body switch to larger needles knit all stitches around in stockinette for approximately 4 inches / 10 cm setup round knit 24 stitches place secondary marker knit 48 stitches place next secondary marker knit remaining 24 stitches to end of round decrease rounds decrease round knit to 2 stitches before first secondary marker ssk slip marker k2tog knit to 2 stitches before next secondary marker ssk slip marker k2tog knit to end of round next round knit all stitches repeat the last two rounds until 16 stitches remain continue working decrease rounds no plain knit rounds until 4 stitches remain total i-cord tip shift the remaining 4 stitches to begin working an i-cord work i-cord until cord measures approximately 2 inches / 5 cm cut yarn thread through remaining stitches and pull tight to close finishing weave in all ends block if desired wear with pride abbreviations k knit p purl ssk slip slip knit k2tog knit 2 together sm slip marker © copyright april pruitt
